description: Registry of known commands with their descriptions, permissions, and risk levels

ls.name: ls
ls.description: List directory contents. Shows files and folders in the specified location.

risk.reason: Read-only operation that only displays file information

pwd.name: pwd
pwd.description: Print working directory. Shows the current directory path.

risk.reason: Read-only operation that only displays current path

cat.name: cat
cat.description: Concatenate and display file contents. Reads and outputs file data.

risk.reason: Read-only operation for viewing file contents

echo.name: echo
echo.description: Display a line of text. Outputs the provided arguments to stdout.

risk.reason: Safe output operation with no system modifications

head.name: head
head.description: Output the first part of files. Shows beginning lines of a file.

risk.reason: Read-only operation for viewing file contents

tail.name: tail
tail.description: Output the last part of files. Shows ending lines of a file.

risk.reason: Read-only operation for viewing file contents

grep.name: grep
grep.description: Search for patterns in files. Finds matching text using regular expressions.

risk.reason: Read-only search operation

find.name: find
find.description: Search for files in a directory hierarchy. Locates files matching criteria.

risk.reason: Read-only file search operation

wc.name: wc
wc.description: Word, line, character, and byte count. Counts text metrics in files.

risk.reason: Read-only counting operation

which.name: which
which.description: Locate a command. Shows the path to an executable.

risk.reason: Read-only path lookup

git.name: git
git.description: Version control system. Manages code repositories and tracks changes.

risk.reason: Can modify repository state; some operations like push affect remote

npm.name: npm
npm.description: Node.js package manager. Installs dependencies and runs scripts.

risk.reason: Installs external packages and runs arbitrary scripts

pip.name: pip
pip.description: Python package installer. Installs Python libraries from PyPI.

risk.reason: Installs external packages which could contain malicious code

python.name: python
python.description: Python interpreter. Executes Python code and scripts.

risk.reason: Executes arbitrary code; risk depends on the script content
Executes arbitrary code; risk depends on the script content

mkdir.name: mkdir
mkdir.description: Make directories. Creates new folders in the filesystem.

risk.reason: Creates directories; minimal risk but modifies filesystem

touch.name: touch
touch.description: Create empty file or update timestamp. Modifies file metadata.

risk.reason: Creates files or updates timestamps; minimal impact

cp.name: cp
cp.description: Copy files and directories. Duplicates files to new locations.

risk.reason: Can overwrite existing files; modifies filesystem

mv.name: mv
mv.description: Move or rename files. Relocates files or changes their names.

risk.reason: Can overwrite files and remove originals

rm.name: rm
rm.description: Remove files or directories. Permanently deletes files.

risk.reason: Permanently deletes files; cannot be undone easily

rmdir.name: rmdir
rmdir.description: Remove empty directories. Deletes empty folders.

risk.reason: Deletes directories; only works on empty ones

chmod.name: chmod
chmod.description: Change file permissions. Modifies read/write/execute access.

risk.reason: Alters security permissions; could expose or lock files

chown.name: chown
chown.description: Change file owner. Transfers ownership of files.

risk.reason: Changes file ownership; security implications

sudo.name: sudo
sudo.description: Execute command as superuser. Runs with elevated privileges.

risk.reason: Executes with root privileges; maximum system access

curl.name: curl
curl.description: Transfer data from URLs. Downloads or uploads via HTTP/FTP.

risk.reason: Network operation; could download malicious content

wget.name: wget
wget.description: Download files from the web. Retrieves files via HTTP/FTP.

risk.reason: Network operation; could download malicious content

ssh.name: ssh
ssh.description: Secure shell. Connect to remote systems securely.

risk.reason: Establishes remote connections; security sensitive

docker.name: docker
docker.description: Container management. Build, run, and manage containers.

risk.reason: Runs isolated environments with system access capabilities
